Package org.ingatan.component

Mainly windows and dialogues, but also includes a couple of other general component classes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
OptionPane An interface for all Image Editor option panes.
 

Class Summary
AboutWindow About window with information regarding the license.
FileChooserPreviewPane Provides a preview for any selected image.
IconFileView An extension to fileview which allowed me to set custom icons for folders, image files, and non-image files.
MainMenuWindow The main menu for Ingatan.
PaintedJPanel Paints a border and background onto the panel.
PreferencesDialog Allows the user to set the symbol menu keymap, as well as a couple of other preferences.
QuizHistoryWindow Simple window displaying past quiz results.
ThinScrollComboBoxUI Used to apply the ThinScrollComboPopup to new instances of the combo box.
ThinScrollComboPopup Makes the scroll bar within a JComboBox popup list much thinner.
 

Package org.ingatan.component Description

Mainly windows and dialogues, but also includes a couple of other general component classes.
